jobDescription: Performed end-to-end testing for the Karobar App (Mobile/Web) ERP software, including manual and automated test case execution, API testing with Postman, and performance testing with JMeter. Contributed to static and dynamic testing using various techniques, collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, and optimized test efficiency through Selenium automation and SQL-based data validation.

Assisted in software testing by developing and executing test cases, identifying bugs, and supporting documentation efforts to ensure product quality and streamline QA processes in collaboration with the QA team.
